vecvec 0.8.1

Match Primary Vector Against Lookup Vector

vecvec.Rd

Matches a primary character vector against a lookup vector and returns indices and matches.

Usage

vecvec(primary, lookup)

Arguments

primary

A character vector to be matched.

lookup

A character vector to match against.

Value

A list containing indices and matches.

Examples

vecvec(create_random_names(), create_random_names())
#> $indices
#> $indices$primary
#> $indices$primary$data_index
#> # A tibble: 100 × 4
#>    original_row_id unique_string_id value           stnd_string    
#>              <int>            <int> <chr>           <chr>          
#>  1               1                1 Robinson        robinson       
#>  2               2                2 AMELIA          amelia         
#>  3               3                3 SARAH WHITE     sarah white    
#>  4               4                4 ROBERT MARTINEZ robert martinez
#>  5               5                5 SUSAN JOHNSON   susan johnson  
#>  6               6                6 Barbara         barbara        
#>  7               7                7 lucas lewis     lucas lewis    
#>  8               8                8 john            john           
#>  9               9                9 charles         charles        
#> 10              10               10 LUCAS WRIGHT    lucas wright   
#> # ℹ 90 more rows
#> 
#> $indices$primary$string_index
#> # A tibble: 67 × 2
